meanings.definition: A person or thing that immunizes.
meanings.sent1: The nurse was an immunizers who administered vaccines to children.
meanings.sent2: The immunizers at the clinic worked tirelessly to protect the community from diseases.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's power was to act as an immunizers, shielding the city from harm.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against illness, doctors are the ultimate immunizers, fighting to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent5: The immunizers were like guardians, creating a shield of protection around those they cared for.

meanings.sent1: The team of immunizers traveled to different regions to provide vaccinations.
meanings.sent2: After the outbreak, the immunizers were called in to help prevent further spread of the disease.
meanings.sent3: The group of immunizers formed a strong bond while working together to keep the community safe.
meanings.sent4: The immunizers stood united in their mission to safeguard the population from infections.
meanings.sent5: Each of the immunizers played a crucial role in building a barrier against sickness.
